description_for_human: Find keywords, generate content briefs, perform SEO analysis, and extract SEO information.
description_for_model: A versatile tool designed to assist users in various aspects of search engine optimization (SEO) and content analysis. Among its key features is the ability to analyze specific keywords, providing users with valuable data such as search volume, keyword difficulty, and search engine results pages (SERP) information. In addition to keyword analysis, it can identify related keywords, offering insights into their respective search volumes, difficulties, and SERP details. Content creators can also benefit from the ability to generate comprehensive content briefs based on a user provided keyword and website URL. This feature helps guide the creation of SEO optimized content that aligns with the target keyword. Furthermore, it offers an SEO analysis feature that allows users to assess whether an article is optimized for SEO based on a given keyword and URL. Lastly, it is equipped with an SEO extractor that can retrieve essential SEO information from a specific URL. Overall, this is a valuable resource for individuals and businesses looking to enhance their online presence and improve their content strategy.
